item.title: Google’s subscriptions rise in Q4 as YouTube pulls $60B in yearly revenue
item.description: The company said it now has 325 million paying users across Google One and YouTube Premium, up from 300 million users three months earlier.

item.title: Spotify ventures into physical book sales, adds new audiobook features
item.description: Spotify users in the U.S. and the UK will soon be able to buy physical books in the app. There's also a new tool that syncs physical books to audioboo...

item.title: Sam Altman got exceptionally testy over Claude Super Bowl ads
item.description: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."

item.title: As it preps Specs for the masses, Snap’s Q4 shows revenue growth but fewer daily users
item.description: The company is engaged in a strategy to diversify its revenue sources as it heads into the new year.

item.title: Mundi Ventures closes on €750M for Kembara, its largest deep tech and climate fund
item.description: Spain-based deeptech and climate megafund Kembara has just completed a €750 million first close toward its €1 billion target.
